title: Three Connected Graphs Explorer
description: Interactive visualization showing f(x), f'(x), and f''(x) simultaneously with synchronized cursor. Students can examine relationships between a function and its derivatives by dragging a cursor across all three graphs and observing how critical points, inflection points, and concavity connect across the representations.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
Derivatives
Second Derivative
Critical Points
Inflection Points
Concavity

prerequisites: Concept of slope and tangent lines

controls.description: Draggable slider to move the vertical cursor across all three graphs
